input_args.passage: "Church of St. Mary of the Spring, Istanbul | ... Our Lady of Spring is located in Istanbul's Zeytinburnu district, the district Balıklı. The church is well maintained. It is inside a cemetery at Balıklı ... Rating: 4.5, \u200e23 reviews"
